mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysInflowHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ INFLOW_SN , HIST_DT , ONLNE_UNT_DSCR , CREAT_CD , LP_CD , ADVT_MATR_NM FROM SYS_INFLOW_HIST WHERE 1 = 1
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteSysInflowHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM SYS_INFLOW_HIST WHERE 1 = 1
